wikipedia_page.main: Bruce Fraser (born 1946), is a British former hammer thrower who competed for England.

response: * Bruce Fraser, 1st Baron Fraser of North Cape (1888–1981), British admiral during World War II, Admiral of the Fleet
* Sir Bruce Fraser (civil servant) (1910–1993), British civil servant and humorist
* Bruce Fraser (author) (1954–2006), author that specialized in digital color technology
